Question: THOTH Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
THOTH Inc.

CES 2024

- Introducing the latest THOTH Inc. drone technology
- Features advanced obstacle avoidance system
- Equipped with high-definition camera for aerial photography and videography
- Offers extended flight time and improved stability
- Integrated with user-friendly control interface
- Designed for professional and recreational use
Summary_cn:
THOTH 公司

2024 年CES展

- 推出最新的THOTH 公司无人机技术
- 配备先进的避障系统
- 配备高清相机，用于航拍和摄影
- 提供延长飞行时间和更稳定的飞行
- 集成了用户友好的控制界面
- 专为专业和休闲使用而设计
